title: Update main README.md with new components
description: Update README.md to document the four new ATEF components (Validation Gates, Pattern Library, Checkpoint System, Error Catalog), explain their purposes and integration points, update component list, and add data-analytics template to available templates section.
notes: README.md update completed. ATEF implementation added 4 major components to claude_code_environment: (1) Validation Gates for pre/post-execution validation, (2) Pattern Library with 13 reusable patterns across 4 categories, (3) Checkpoint System for state snapshots and rollback, (4) Error Catalog with 6 seed errors for learning from failures. Data-analytics template added as specialized template for Microsoft Fabric/Power BI/DAX projects. All components integrated via complete-task.md workflow.
